body: This spell functions as simulacrum, except you can't create a simulacrum of a creature whose HD or levels exceed your caster level, and it has no magical abilities. The creature is not under your control, though it recognizes you are its creator.
description: Creates a double of a weak creature.

components.text: an ice sculpture of the target plus powdered rubies worth 50 gp per HD of the simulacrum

component_text: V, S, M (an ice sculpture of the target plus powdered rubies worth 50 gp per HD of the simulacrum)
name: Simulacrum, Lesser
